attributes.action: Establish a minimum level of service on 'Budget Airlines'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is now generally recognised that flights are a significant source of CO2 and various unpopular taxes have been introduced to curb the growth of air traffic.

A large budget carrier keeps reducing its costs by reducing the level of service offered, including no check in desks, no seat allocations and now, potentially, a lavatory charge!

I petition the prime minister to make a minimum level of service manditory. This would require, as a starting point:

Manned checkin desks.
Allocated seating.
Free Lavatory.
Minimum 20kg checked baggage allowance.

This would keep seat prices a little higher and reduce passenger frustrations. This would be a benift to the travelling public.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
